scripts.test:integration: polymer build # test that psk builds without error with the CLI
scripts.start: touch src/bundle.js && polymer serve & watchify src/bundle.js -d -v -o bundle.main.js
scripts.module-list: cp bundle.js src/bundle.js && cat src/* | grep window.getModule | grep -v 'name => require' | sed 's|window.getModule|require|g' | sed 's/ //g' | sort | uniq >> src/bundle.js
